title: Alaska State Troopers Press Release of Thursday, November 3, 2016
content:
Dispatch Text:
On 11-02-2016 at approximately 2223 hours, Alaska State Troopers in Klawock were notified by the Thorn Bay VPSO of a gunshot wound victim currently being transported via ambulance from the Sandy Beach area of Thorn Bay to the Alicia Roberts Clinic in Klawock. AST investigation revealed that a 29 year old female had been removing a firearm from the rear seat area of a vehicle when the gun went off. The bullet struck the female in the leg. The female was treated at the Alicia Roberts Clinic and expected to be medivaced with serious leg trauma.
Author: GEW1
